subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Alberto Contador, a Spanish rider for Astana, won his second straight Tour of Basque Country title Saturday after extending his overall lead in the final stage ending in Zalla, Spain. He is using the Basque classic as part of his preparations for the Tour de France, which he won in 2007.
